analysis.key_quote: The only reason to make thousands of more professional civil servants in NIH into schedule F quasi-political appointees would be to impose extra political considerations onto the job of finding and funding the best research.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the effectiveness of the current merit-based system. It emphasizes the importance of accountability and the integrity of scientific research without political interference.
